thread.title: good location for weekend away being out all day
thread.title_full: good location for weekend away being out all day - Review of Point A Hotel, London Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: A-Dymond
title: good location for weekend away being out all day
text: Fab location next to Lambeth North tube station, About 15min walk from london eye and westminster, staff were really lovely especially Maria. It was cramped room but okay for two of us as we were hardly there. There is not any tea/coffee facilities but they have a hot drink machine and costa next door. Hotel had some building work where we were located so check if that is still happening as it will impact your sleep.
